name: Odd Block
description: A movable block with different types.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Defines the type or usage of the odd block.

6.name: Shopkeeper
6.description: The block is used as a shopkeeper's block.

48.name: Royal Throne
48.description: The block is part of a royal throne.

64.name: Pyramide
64.description: The block is part of a pyramid structure.

97.name: Pile of Barrels
97.description: The block is a pile of barrels.
